maqras.text: khx saban dwy meuxng ni
læa cea nan pen phu xasay xyu nı meuxng ni
læa khx saban dwy phu bangkeid læa phu thuxkaneid
doy nænxn rea di bangkeid mnusʹy ma pheux phechiy khwam yak labak
khea khid wa mimi phu dı ca mi khwam samarth henux khea kranan hrux
khea cung klaw wa chan di phlay thraphysmbati ma makmay læw
Khea khid wa mimi phu dı hen khea kranan hrux
rea midi tha dwngta thang sxng khang hı kæ khea dxk hrux
læa lin læa rimfipak thang sxng dwy
læa rea di chinæa thang hæng khwam di læa khwam chaw kæ khea læw
kranan k di khea k yang mi phakpheiyr bn thang labak
læa xan dı lea thi ca thahı cea ru wa thang labak nan khux xari
khux kar plxy thas
hrux kar hı xahar nı wan yak labak hæng khwam hiwhoy
kæ dek kaphra thi pen yati kıl chid
hrux khn yakcn khadsn thi mxm xyu kab fun din
læw khea di xyu nı hmu phu sraththa læa takteuxn kan hı mi khwam xdthn læa takteuxn kan hı mi khwam metta
chn hela ni khux phwk faykhwa
swn brrda phu ptiseth sraththa tx sayyan tang «khxng rea phwk khea khux phwk faysay
bn phwk khea nan mi fi nrk khrxbkhlum xyu xyang midchid
khx saban dwy dwng xathity læa sængswang khxng man
læa dwy dwng canthr meux khocr tam hlang man
læa dwy wela klangwan meux prakay sæng man (cak dwng xathity)
læa dwy wela klangkhun meux pkkhlum man
læa dwy chan fa læa thi phraxngkh thrng srang man
læa dwy phændin læa thi phraxngkh thrng phæ man
læa dwy chiwit læa thi phraxngkh thrng thahı man smburn
læw phraxngkh thrng dlcı man hı ru thang chaw khxng man læa thang sarwm khxng man
nænxn phu khadkela chiwit yxm di rab khwam sarec
læa nænxn phu hmkmun man (dwy kar tha chaw) yxm lm helw
phwk sa mud di ptiseth dwy kar lameid khxbkhet khxng phwk khea
meux khn lew thram thisud khxng phwk khea di ribrud pi (kha xuth tawmeiy)
læw rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ cung klaw kæ phwk khea wa (xya tharay) xuth khx ngxallxhˌ læa(xya khadkhwang)kar dum na khxng man

tæ phwk khea k mi cheux na bi læw phwk khea kdi kha man dangnan phracea khxng phwk khea cung di thalay lang phwk khea neuxngcak pheraa khwam phid khxng phwk khea læw phraxngkh thrng lngthosʹ phwk khea xyang thwn hna kan
læa phraxngkh mi thrng hwadhwan tx pan play phwk man
khx saban dwy wela klangkhun meux man pkkhlum
Læa dwy wela klangwan meux man prakay sæng
læa dwy phu thi thrng bangkeid phes chay læa phes hying
thæcring kar ngan khxng phwk cea nan yxm tæk tang kan xyang nænxn
swn phu thi bricakh læa yakerng (xallxhˌ)
læa cheux man nı sing thi di
rea k ca hı khea di rab khwam sadwk xyang ngayday
læa swn phu thi trahni læa thuxwa mi phx pheiyng læw
læa ptiseth sing thi di ngam
rea k ca hı khea di rab khwam labak xyang ngayday
læa thraphysmbati khxng khea ca mi xanwy prayochn kæ khea di meux khea tk pi nı hew nrk
thæcring hnathi khxng rea nan khux hıkar chinæa thang
læa thæcring prlok læa lok ni pen khxng rea
dangnan kha khx teuxn phwk cea thung fi thi luk son
mimi phu dı ca kheapi nı phea him nı man nxkcak khn lew thram thisud
khux phu thi ptiseth læa phinhlanghı
læa swn phu thi yakerng ying nan ca thuk pliktaw hı hang kil cak man
sung khea bricakh thraphysin khxng khea pheux khadkela tnxeng
læa thi khea nan mimi buy khun kæ phu dı thi buy khun nan ca thuk txbthæn
nxkcak wa pheux sæwng khwam pordpran cak phracea khxng khea phuthrng sungsng theanan
læa khea k ca phung phxcı
khx saban dwy wela say
læa dwy wela klangkhun meux man mud læa sngad ngeiyb
phracea khxng cea midi thrng thxdthing cea læa midi thrng korth kheuxng cea
læa nænxn beuxng play penkar di ying kæ cea kwa beuxngtn
læa khwam nænxn phracea khxng cea ca hı kæ cea cnkwa ca phxcı
phraxngkh midi thrng phb cea pen kaphra læw thrng hı thiphung dxk hrux
læa thrng phb cea ra he rerxn læw k thrng chinæa thang (kæ cea) dxk hrux
læa thrng phb cea pen phu khadsn læw hı mangkhang (kæ) cea dxk hrux
dangnan swn dek kaphra cea xya khmkhi
læa swn phu xey khx nan cea xya twad khab li
læa swn khwam pordpran hæng phracea khxng cea nan cea cng sædngxxk
